content: measurements to fit head approx 56cm cleckheaton verve 12 ply 50g balls quantity 8703 wildflowers x 2 needles and extras 1 each 4 5mm uk 7 and 5 5mm uk 5 circular knitting needles 40cm long and a set of 5 5mm double-pointed knitting needles or size needed to give correct gauge cable needle wool needle for finishing large pom pom maker gauge 16 sts and 22 rounds to 10cm over stocking st using 5 5mm needles check your gauge by working a stocking st sample in the round every round knit if fewer sts to 10cm use smaller needles if more sts use larger needles intermediate knitting
